entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @Yamiche @IlhanMN Good for those who bristled at Trump's stupid insensitive comment. He also said there were "bad people outside."  Trump and Pence must have had access to an early vaccine or something that protects them from the coronavirus. Trump would not allow anyone in the WH w/o testing. (?)
